pr_title: [FLINK-16113][table-planner-blink] ExpressionReducer shouldn't escape the reduced string value

timeline.message: [FLINK-16113][table-planner-blink] ExpressionReducer shouldn't escape the reduced string value

timeline.bodyText:
This code should consistent with GenerateUtils.generateLiteral.
It is merging error when merged blink to flink.
timeline.author: JingsongLi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -138,8 +138,8 @@ class ExpressionReducer(
                SqlTypeName.MULTISET =>
             reducedValues.add(unreduced)
           case SqlTypeName.VARCHAR | SqlTypeName.CHAR =>
-            val escapeVarchar = StringEscapeUtils

timeline.bodyText: Do we have to add a it case?
timeline.author: JingsongLi

replies.bodyText: I think it's fine to remove it. Will do that.
replies.author: wuchong
